Text.p: Combat-trader craft favoured latterly by pirates, the Mark I Cobra was the first trade ship designed and built for the one-man trader. Its special features at the time of manufacture (by Paynou, Prossett and Salem) was its Prossett Drive, which incorporated afterburners with proton-tightened, interior shaft walls. These are now a standard fitting for both internal and external integuments of all PPS made craft.
